name: Basketball Blitz
description: The galaxy's first basketball tournament is underway! However, the galaxy where time has gone awry never rests and your help is needed to ensure the event concludes without incident!
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Voyages in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- In the Voyage Phase, you will engage in Voyages with ocassional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- Gold and Silver skills for the Voyage Phase will be CMD and DIP. 
-- Voyage Encounters take place at the following points in time: 1 minute, 5 minutes, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 45 minutes, 1 hour, 1.5 hours, 2 hours, and every 2 hours after that.
-- Passing a Voyage Encounter without losing any contests raises the multiplier for Victory Points gained in contests. Losing a contest resets this multiplier.
-- Three of the following traits are randomly chosen for each Encounter: Inspiring, Explorer, Scoundrel, Casual, Playful, Hero, Marksman, Investigator. Using crew with matching traits increases their Crit Chance in contests.
-- Using any version of Tucker, Sato, Bokai, or Athletes will provide a bonus to antimatter and a permanent multiplier to passively gained Victory Points during the Voyage Phase, as well as bonus to Supply Missions during the Galaxy Phase.
-- Using the NX-02 Columbia, the U.S.S. T'Kumbra, or the NX-Class Ship will provide a bonus to antimatter during the Voyage Phase.
-- Using ships with the Pioneer trait will provide a bonus to antimatter during the Voyage Phase.
-- In the Voyage Phase you earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters. The amount you earn increases with every Voyage Encounter passed. 
-- In the Galaxy Phase every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. 
-- Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Tucker, Sato, Bokai, or Athletes

featured_crew.name: T'Pol
featured_crew.flavor: Tâ€™Pol does not consider a hybrid child dangerous. Therefore, being held hostage in Orpheus, she protects the child in every possible way.

action.name: I Won't Let You Hurt Her

featured_crew.name: Sato
featured_crew.flavor: There are many ways to prove oneself on a starship, including holding your own in a game of pick-up basketball.

action.name: Time To Switch Sides Again, Doctor
It Ain't Over Til It's Over

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Sato
rewards.flavor: Comm Officer onboard the Enterprise, Hoshi Sato's experiences led her to create a universal linguacode.

action.name: Translate

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: T'Pol
rewards.flavor: Tâ€™Pol does not consider a hybrid child dangerous. Therefore, being held hostage in Orpheus, she protects the child in every possible way.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: T'Pol
rewards.flavor: Tâ€™Pol does not consider a hybrid child dangerous. Therefore, being held hostage in Orpheus, she protects the child in every possible way.

action.name: I Won't Let You Hurt Her
It Ain't Over Til It's Over

rewards.name: Sato
rewards.flavor: There are many ways to prove oneself on a starship, including holding your own in a game of pick-up basketball.

action.name: Time To Switch Sides Again, Doctor

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!
